Bias-free hiring directly within your ATS to help you drive diversity in your organisation. As Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) continues to rise up the list as one of the most important challenges at the forefront of growing organisations, traditional bias training is no longer enough to make a real impact. There are over a hundred types of cognitive biases in the human brain, such as confirmation bias and halo effect bias. These biases impact every decision made throughout the hir and
because of the way the brain functions, everyone has a cognitive bias. The MeVitae team has spent
years researching the science of Human Resources (HR), and D&I, and has used deep-tech to
successfully develop a suite of solutions that de-bias every step of the hiring process.
MeVitae’s mission is to transform the way organisations secure top talent and identify potential
leaders, and help them to become more diverse and inclusive whilst remaining competitive in the
ever-evolving market.  Specifically, during a candidate selection process, the blind recruiting plug-
in can redact more than 22 types of bias identifiers including gender, ethnicity and university from
CVs and Cover Letters, directly from a company’s Application Tracking System (ATS).
MeVitae’s solutions have been designed with versatility in mind and as such they plug into 20
different ATSs, including our partners Greenhouse, Taleo to name a few. Not only does this
solution have a track record of achieving over 95% accuracy in redacting biases – it does this at a
super speed of 600 CVs per 6 seconds! The solution has also demonstrated an increase of more
than 30% in D&I within organisations. MeVitae’s robust solutions help you to focus on finding the
right person for the role, without cognitive and unconscious bias as well as algorithmic bias.

Three successful companies, dozens of failed attempts at partnering with vendors to help facilitate our revenue growth, so we were forced to do it on our own. We struggled getting their team to understand what problem we solved and who we solved it for, so we ended up with a calendar full of meetings with tire kickers. After enough carrots, we started to gain vision: revenue generation is holistic. All of the pieces must work in harmony with each other to have success, anerative ever-evolving process -- this is why we have teams for all five of the key areas of the revenue-producing value chain:
 

 (1) Market Research: How do we segment the market? Who do we target? How do we position ourselves in an impactful way?
 

 (2) Lead Generation: Outbound calling, account-based-marketing, digital marketing, and traditional marketing all working hand-in-hand to deliver quality leads on the calendar.
 

 (3) Sales Playbook: Once we get the quality lead on the calendar, what process, talk track, and collateral do we leverage to increase conversion rates and close for the highest $ value possible?
 

 (4) Upsell and Expansion: How and where can I add more value to my customer base to reduce churn and increase average revenue per customer?
 

 (5) Revenue Operations: What technology should I use to facilitate the process & garner actionable insights for growth? How do I set it up? How do I manage it?
 

 We're revenue-isticians. Not magicians.

About Onlime Onlime is a backup and cloud storage service based in Denmark. With datacenters in Scandinavia, Onlime is a safe and privacy-respecting cloud service for individuals, families, businesses and organizations. Onlime apps are supported on Windows, Mac, iOS and Android and lets you back up, sync, archive, and share your files, documents, and photos over the Internet. At Onlime, you are not the product Our mission at Onlime is to gathers as little personal data as d we never sell your personal data to third parties. At Onlime, we uphold personal privacy and concent as a basic human right. Onlime adheres to the standards of GDPR
 Our datacenters at Onlime run on 100% recyclable power. We also run our own servers and infrastructure. In this way, we know our hardware and software stacks from start to finish – this allows us to continually optimize performance and security. 
 

 A subscription for anyone
 We offer free 5 GB storage for everyone with full access to all features. If you dig our service, we offer these paid subscriptions:
 - Personal Unlimite Space
 - Family 1TB
 - Family 5TB
 - Business Small, 2 user-seats, from 1TB storage
 - Business Medium, up to 10 user-seats, from 1TB storage
 - Business Large, unlimited user-seats, from 1TB storage
 

 

 Features
 • PICTURE ORGANIZATION: View your photos and videos in one timeline – photos and videos are automatically uploaded and organized from all your devices using Onlime apps.
 

 • FULL QUALITY: Your photos and videos are always saved in 100% original quality.
 

 • NO FILE PROCESSING OR ALTERATION: We always store your files in it’s original format and size. We never process
 

 • SHARE MEMORIES WITH OTHERS: Create albums and share via link. With an account, others can follow your album, upload photos and comment.
 

 • FREE UP SPACE: With one tap, you can remove photos and videos on your device, that are already backed up with Onlime.
 

 • AUTOMATIC BACKUP: Get automatic backup of all your folders and files on PC/Mac. On your mobile device, you can setup automatic backup of photos, videos and contacts.
 

 • SYNCHRONIZE YOUR FILES: Continue where you left off - access the same files from all your devices. This is handy, when you have multipe devices or want to collaborate on files with other people!
 

 • USE MICROSOFT OFFICE ONLINE FREE: With Onlime you can create, edit and collaborate in Word, Excel and Powerpoint right from your browser. This integrations is free to use, and you’ll be amazed of how much you can do right in your browser.
 

 • GET HELP WITH LIVE-SUPPORT DIRECTLY IN OUR APP: Get help with using our service directly in the app. We are ready to help big and small – just write us and we typically answer within a few hours.
 

 • DOCUMENT SCANNER: With our mobile app, you can easily scan and transfer documents, receipts and old photos to the Onlime cloud. Use features like auto-cropping, contrast and color adjustment.
 

 • TIME MACHINE: We always store the 5 latest versions of all the files you upload to Onlime. Turn back time and restore the version you want!
 

 • FILE SHARING: Share files, folders and photo albums via link or invitation. You decide if others can just access, or if they can edit and upload too.
 

 • AUTO-SAVE DOCUMENTS: Using our mobile apps, your documents are saved automatically when you open a document via Onlime and edit it in i.e. Word or Excel.
 

 • INTEGRATE WITH ARCHIVES: Do you have an iPhone/iPad? Get the most out of your device and Onlime: Activate Onlime in the Files app. You'll get easy access to your files in Onlime from apps like Mail and iMovie.
 

 • CHROMECAST & AIRPLAY: Watch your photos, videos and documents on your TV with Chromecast and AirPlay.
  
 • POWERFULL WEB-APP: Upload, edit and organize all your uploaded files right in your browser.
 

 • SEE PHOTO CAPTURE LOCATION AND METADATA: See which camera settings you used, or which location you shot your memories. This is supported in our mobile apps and web-app.
 

 • FREE STORAGE SPACE: Create a free Onlime account and get 5 GB of free storage. Does not require credit card.
 

 More details:
 - Onlime support all file types 
 - Onlime support photos taken on iPhone / iPad with Liveshot, HDR and in file format heic. 
 - We do not offer a app/client for Linux at the moment. We encourage Linux-users to use our web-app or try installing our Windows-app with WINE.

"Gnosis Freight is the world’s first Container Lifecycle Management™ platform (“CLM platform”). Gnosis provides shippers a smarter way to track and manage the full lifecycle of the one standard asset in the supply chain – the container – from the cargo ready date until the container is returned empty to the terminal. Gnosis' proprietary Marlo™ container tracking engine aggregates the world’s container shipping data sources into a singular data model. Utilizing intelligent data enriologies to combine data from ocean carriers, ports/terminals, Class I Rail Carriers, AIS, and more, it provides opinionated and contextualized milestone data throughout every point in a container’s journey, creating the most complete container visibility in the industry.  

There are more than 20 powerful supply chain execution modules (“CLM Enhancements”) built on top of that data which can be added on to any CLM platform. These enhancements help improve processes, reduce costs, and provide new insights into a company supply chains empowering logistics teams to make critical business decisions and collaborate with partners more effectively than ever. 

Logistics professionals no longer have to spend their time aggregating data from multiple sources and then working to find disruptions. The CLM platform and Marlo automatically identify the exceptions in the supply chain so the logistics team can spend their time managing them to keep goods moving and save enormous amounts of time and money. 

Unlike most traditional software companies who design their systems a certain way and then make their customers fit into a standard box, Gnosis engineers architect each customer's platform to their exact needs. We know every company has its own unique supply chain processes, so we build the Gnosis box around them.

Parental Control - Protect Children

Vidon.ai automatically generates engaging shareable videos from your blog posts. Use video to standout on social, rank higher on Google, and share your content on video only platforms. ## Key Benefits **Stand out on Social** Share a teaser video to your new blog post on social media. Leads prefer consuming video and it is 3x more likely to get shared. **Rank higher on Google** Google loves video content! Increase your rankings and dwell times by embedding video into your blog posts. **Bo.den your audience**

Share your content on video only platforms like TikTok and YouTube to speak to repurpose your content to a new audience.

## **Detailed description of your app**

**How it works**

- Videos are automatically generated from your blog post in seconds.
- Just enter the articles URL and click generate!
- Your article’s headings, text, and images will be used to create the video.
- Pick one of our super realistic AI voiceovers to read your text.
- You can also create a video manually to give you complete control.

**What type of videos can I make?**

- **Blog post teaser** - Share the introduction to an article and prompt to read the full article on your website. These videos are perfect to share your new blog post as they have a higher click through rate than text/image only posts.
- **Reviews / Case studies** - Let customer reviews and case studies speak for themselves. Turns text based testimonials into video.
- **How to’s** - Create explainer videos for marketing, training, or support in minutes not hours.
- **Announcements -** Share news about new features or job postings to your audience in a more engaging video format.
- **And more!**

**Video can skyrocket SEO**

- Feature snippets - Pages with video have a higher chance of being selected as a feature snippet.
- Boost click through rate - Pages with video will sometimes show the video thumbnail in the search engine results page. This can skyrocket your CTR even if you’re not the 1st result.
- Wider reach - Sites with video will be shown in Google image and Google video search broadening your reach.
- Longer dwell time - Dwell time is the amount of time a visitors spends on your site. It’s a key metric to your search rankings. As videos are more engaging and can’t be skimmed they can hugely increase dwell time and your ranking.
- Less competition - Google loves video content! There are 100s of articles for every keyword you want to rank for - but only a handful of videos.

**Video grows your social following**

- Grow your audience - Many platforms promote video over text/images. It’s more likely to be seen and shared. Showing your content to a wider audience.
- Stand out - Video is eye catching and engaging, create scroll stopping videos from your existing content.
- Boost click through rate - Video feels more personal and let you share more value upfront which improves click through rate to your website.
- Video only platforms - Many platforms only allow video, repurpose your text into video to engage a wider audience. Share your blogs on YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and more!

7.ABOUT:
Summary and Relevance for Covid-19 Desk Sharing is a solution for desk reservations. It has become more and more relevant during the Covid-19 pandemic with its regulations like safety distances. Office administrators can comply with latest policies by increasing or decreasing the number of available desks. Some companies expanded during the pandemic, hiring home office workers. The new workers didn’t get a dedicated desk and there is simply not enough space for everybody. Plus, eve “Home office is here to stay”. Why bother about creating more office space? Just make sure to avoid overbooking on popular days and monitor desk utilization.
Another case for many companies around the globe is: 2020-2021 did not go as planned. If you need to downsize the office space due to cost reduction, desk sharing is the perfect solution to support hybrid work.
With the Desk Sharing solution, users easily see available desks in real time on the browser or via dedicated displays on site. The booking covers the walk-in situation for the next hours and supports those users who like to plan the next weeks from home. The latter can do convenient multi-bookings for the days they’re planning to visit the office.
The solution can be deployed based on programs like O635, Microsoft Exchange or Google Workspace (formerly GSuite). But it’s capable of running without calendar integrations.


Functionality


The main view gives a visual orientation on the floor plan including custom orientation objects like doors, walls, copy machines. This view shows red and green elements, giving the reservation status of desks or workstations.
On each floor, customers can choose to operate big overview displays or tablets. All users can access the floor plans also on their PCs/smartphones. Users are in the situation of asking “Which desk is free for how many hours?” or “Where is the desk I booked yesterday?”. In a walk-in booking, users can check for availability based on time slots or check the layout plan. This is a visual search for free space. Another use case supported here is: “26 of 40 desks are free but I want to sit close to my team leader whom I can see over there”. The booking is done by pressing on the desk.
The booking for future days usually works in a way that users specify the location and day. The free tables can be recognized by their green coloring. Through additional color coding, it is apparent whether a desk is occupied for the full day, booked only for the morning or for the afternoon. The bookings of the colleagues are listed with their names. Select and confirm - done. If there are special requirements for the workplace, these can be called up via additional information (e.g. two monitors or specific equipment). Pictures can also be stored. Accepted reservations are confirmed by email and include links to import calendar entries for Outlook, Google calendar or other client programs.


Advanced Upgrade Options


If one has arrived at the last meters, there are further concepts to support wayfinding or to display the status. Optional mini-displays showing the booking status on each desk - similar to a digital meeting room door sign. Some customers prefer to have one tablet display for a group of desks inside the open office. To save hardware costs for tablets, android boxes could be implemented as well. Those are connected to the existing monitors as a 2nd HDMI input source. Another option is to integrate 3rd party standalone programmable LEDs to give visibility from distance. Depending on the customer’s requirements, occupancy can be processed using sensors. The solution can be deployed within a day. In big office environments with hundreds of desks it needs a project approach to satisfy individual requirements like advanced integrations.

Just make sure to avoid overbooking on popular days and monitor desk utilization.
Another case for many companies around the globe is: 2020-2021 did not go as planned. If you need to downsize the office space due to cost reduction, desk sharing is the perfect solution to support hybrid work.
With the Desk Sharing solution, users easily see available desks in real time on the browser or via dedicated displays on site. The booking covers the walk-in situation for the next hours and supports those users who like to plan the next weeks from home. The latter can do convenient multi-bookings for the days they’re planning to visit the office.
The solution can be deployed based on programs like O635, Microsoft Exchange or Google Workspace (formerly GSuite). But it’s capable of running without calendar integrations.


Functionality


The main view gives a visual orientation on the floor plan including custom orientation objects like doors, walls, copy machines. This view shows red and green elements, giving the reservation status of desks or workstations.
On each floor, customers can choose to operate big overview displays or tablets. All users can access the floor plans also on their PCs/smartphones. Users are in the situation of asking “Which desk is free for how many hours?” or “Where is the desk I booked yesterday?”. In a walk-in booking, users can check for availability based on time slots or check the layout plan. This is a visual search for free space. Another use case supported here is: “26 of 40 desks are free but I want to sit close to my team leader whom I can see over there”. The booking is done by pressing on the desk.
The booking for future days usually works in a way that users specify the location and day. The free tables can be recognized by their green coloring. Through additional color coding, it is apparent whether a desk is occupied for the full day, booked only for the morning or for the afternoon. The bookings of the colleagues are listed with their names. Select and confirm - done. If there are special requirements for the workplace, these can be called up via additional information (e.g. two monitors or specific equipment). Pictures can also be stored. Accepted reservations are confirmed by email and include links to import calendar entries for Outlook, Google calendar or other client programs.


Advanced Upgrade Options


If one has arrived at the last meters, there are further concepts to support wayfinding or to display the status. Optional mini-displays showing the booking status on each desk - similar to a digital meeting room door sign. Some customers prefer to have one tablet display for a group of desks inside the open office. To save hardware costs for tablets, android boxes could be implemented as well. Those are connected to the existing monitors as a 2nd HDMI input source. Another option is to integrate 3rd party standalone programmable LEDs to give visibility from distance. Depending on the customer’s requirements, occupancy can be processed using sensors. The solution can be deployed within a day. In big office environments with hundreds of desks it needs a project approach to satisfy individual requirements like advanced integrations.

12.ABOUT: ShardSecure offers a Virtual Appliance that can be deployed in the Cloud or On-premises that uses Microshard technology to ensure data security and privacy. The appliance ingests data via iSCSI, S3 Compatible Object Storage API, Native API, SMB, and NFS. Upon ingestion, data is compressed then shred into microshards (tiny pieces as small as 4 bytes). Microshard data is thoroughly mixed, poison data is added and new shards (containers holding many microshards) equal to the number of corage destinations are formed. Data is then be distributed following a user-set policy to multiple independent locations, which may include on-premises/datacenter storage, Amazon S3, Azure, Google and IBM Cloud. The appliance will reassemble microshard data whenever needed.

# Make ideas happen Ideas are just the first step. The hard part is what follows. How to seize the aha moments, fill the gap between your vision and reality, and, more importantly, how to make your ideas happen. Luckily, Effie will help with the hard part. ## Unblock your creativity and productivity Focus is the key to good writing. So Effie cuts out distractions with its minimal interface. No bells and whistles. It’s just you, your thoughts, and the words on the page. ## Turn yonto what you wanted

Your brain likes associations. So to turn your great ideas and thoughts into brilliant writing, you need to visualize them, keep them organized, and find logical connections. That's why you can create mind maps in Effie even when writing. With the mind mapping feature, we help to bring your ideas to life.

## Markup formatting and mind mapping, two is better than one

Whether you’re already writing or planning to write, Effie is ready to help. With just one click, you can switch from a mind map to an editor. All changes are automatically synced.

## Work on all your devices

Wherever you are and whatever device you have, Effie is there for you whenever your inspiration strikes. She works on Windows, Mac, iPhone, and iPad. She also syncs between all your devices in real-time. So when another idea hits, note it down with whatever device you have on hand, so you'll have easy access to it when you're back at your desk.

## We care deeply about your privacy and data security

All your work in Effie is encrypted with your unique key. In other words, no one has access to what you write. So no targeted ads, no intelligent recommendations, nothing. Your data is safe with us.

## You focus on your thoughts, Effie helps with the rest

Effie has what you need to start writing and keep writing. Her simple Markdown-based editor allows you to mark your headlines, important text, comments and more, so you can finish your work without having to lift a finger from your keyboard. 

-------------------------

Features:

+ All your work is in one place and within reach. So there’s no confusing file management.
+ Autosave and sync all your work in the cloud, so you can access anything from anywhere.
+ An immersive writing environment to keep you away from distractions.
+ One tap to convert an unordered list into a mind map, and vice versa.
+ Edits on the unordered list will be synced with a mind map, saving you from jumping the hoops from one app to another.
+ Flexible export to a PDF, DOCX, Markdown, EffieSheet, and JPEG file, which looks awesome when checked on the phone.
+ Simplified markup language allows you to finish your writing without even lifting your fingers away from the keyboard.
+ Markup Insight panel woken by a “/” makes it much easier to use the markup language.
+ You can choose to write in the dark or light theme, whichever drives your creativity and productivity.
+ Different styles are available for your mind maps: Fishbones, Logic Chart, Matrix, Timeline, and Org Chart.
+ Built with native codes, so it occupies less system resources than you'd think.

The simplest way to setup and maintain apps in multiple languages. Plug-and-Play Experience: While other solutions simply provide API endpoints, we go multiple steps further and provide fully pre-built API integrations so development teams can "turn-on" localization hassle-free across their tech stack. This is particularly valuable for smaller teams or startups with limited engineering resources and a million priorities to balance. Lightning Fast Continuous Localization Setup [10 minutes]: .ere's what it takes for a native iOS app to go from a single language app to a multilingual app. 
(1) Developer sets up upload integration with Xcode build system [takes 1 minute]
(2) Strings will collect and compile all untranslated strings from Objective-C, XiB, Storyboards, etc. [takes 1 minute]
(3) Strings will generate and compile translation context cues to feed AI translation engine [takes 1 minute]
(4) Developer chooses languages they would like to support [takes 30 seconds]
(5) Strings immediately starts translating and sends notification once translations are done [5 minutes]
(6) Developer sets up download integration with Xcode build system [takes 1 minute]
(7) Strings integrates translations back into Xcode project and triggers pull request in CI/CD process [takes 30 seconds]

And you're done! Continuous localization is setup and now every time developers push new features, Strings will work in the background to ensure they have multilingual support. 

It's seriously that easy :)

Zoho TeamInbox is a platform where you can share inboxes with your teams and collaborate with them better. Sync your group emails like marketing@, finance@, etc. to manage them from a single, unified space. Zoho TeamInbox aims to make group email conversations transparent within a team. Send and receive group emails, assign owners to conversations, conduct behind-the-scenes discussions to send out faster and precise replies. Co-author emails, and efficiently manage your inbox—avirtual roof. 
 

 Zoho TeamInbox is a comprehensive tool for communication outside the team and collaboration within the team. 
 

 Zoho TeamInbox comes with a multitude of features that make inbox management easy: 
 

 

 Unified and transparent teams 
 With an inbox that's visible and accessible to the whole team, you can eliminate forwarded emails and long, confusing threads for good. Everyone on the team will always be aware of ongoing tasks and their progress. Transparency is effortless with Zoho TeamInbox! 
 

 Uncomplicated collaboration 
 Conduct discussions about emails with your team without having to switch apps and lose context. You can even invite people outside your team to contribute. This way, you can make sure you're always sending accurate responses to your emails. 
 

 Achieve Inbox Zero with ease
 Zoho TeamInbox helps you sort emails based on priority and close threads when you are done with them. This gives you more space for ongoing conversations so you can focus on your most important threads. 
 

 Assign owners for threads
 Delegate emails to the right owner to make sure no message is overlooked. Always know who is working on what— and that everyone's assignments are clearly defined to avoid unnecessary redundancies. 
 

 Personal and team emails under one roof 
 Connect your personal inbox with Zoho TeamInbox to keep all your group and personal emails together. Though personal emails are kept private, you can share specific emails with your teammates for discussion. 
 

 Use pre-set responses for quicker replies 
 Create and save response templates for common questions that your entire team can use for replies. This saves time and energy while ensuring consistency in all emails sent from your team. 
 

 Automation with rules 
 Set specific actions to be performed every time a condition is met. Zoho TeamInbox takes care of the rest. Categorize threads, assign owners, notify teammates, send automated responses, and more. 
 

 Measure team performance
 Determine how well your teams are performing with insightful reports and metrics. You can also track the number of emails flowing in and out of your inboxes. 
 

 Put your trust in secure and private inboxes 
 Data security is built into every layer of Zoho TeamInbox. Emails are encrypted both at transit and at rest. Though inboxes are shared, only admins can assign privileges to view and access messages. Zoho TeamInbox gives you complete control of your data.

12.ABOUT:
Infodeck.io is a comprehensive SaaS based Smart Facilities Management solution that combines several key elements including an Internet of Things (IoT) Management Platform, Computerised Maintenance Management System (CMMS), Feedback & Survey tools, and Asset Management. Each of these components plays a vital role in enhancing operational efficiency and providing insightful data for decision-making. IoT Management Platform: The IoT platform facilitates effortless connectivity, stnagement, and robust security for LoRaWAN IoT devices and data. 🌐 It presents a comprehensive dashboard equipped with intelligent widgets that highlight location-centric and asset-centric functionalities. 📊 By enabling real-time collection, monitoring, and analysis of data from diverse IoT devices, it empowers businesses to make data-driven decisions and enhance operational efficiency. 💪💼

CMMS:Infodeck Mobile App (Available in iOS and Android) enhances your Work Order Management System with time-based or condition-based trigger automation. Ensure seamless scheduling of inspections and maintenance, track completion of work, and accurately record material and labor costs. 💪📱 #infodeck #workorders #automation

Feedback & Survey Tools: Introducing QR code-based Feedback and Survey System with Location and Asset orientation! These innovative tools empower businesses to gather feedback from customers and employees, measure customer satisfaction, employee engagement, and obtain valuable insights for improvement. 📊🗺️🔍📝 #feedback #surveys #improvement

Asset Management: This involves managing the lifecycle and maintenance of physical assets. It helps businesses keep track of their assets, understand their condition, and make informed decisions about asset utilization, replacement, and ensuring optimal working condition throughout their lifespan. 📅✨💼

When these components are integrated with cloud and edge computing technologies, they offer several advantages:

Real-time Data Processing**: Edge computing enables data processing at the edge of the network, close to the source of the data. This reduces latency and allows for real-time decision making.

Scalability**: Cloud computing provides virtually unlimited storage and processing power, enabling the system to scale as per the business requirements.

Security**: Both edge and cloud computing offer robust security measures to protect sensitive data and IoT devices from cyber threats.

Cost Savings**: By reducing the need for extensive data transport and offering pay-as-you-go models, businesses can save significant costs.

The integration with Operational Technology (OT) further enhances the capabilities of the Infodeck solution. OT integration allows for seamless communication between the IoT devices and the management systems, enabling real-time monitoring and control of physical devices and industrial processes. This leads to improved efficiency, safety, and productivity in the operational environment.

In summary, the Infodeck solution provides a holistic, integrated approach to managing and optimizing business operations. It leverages advanced technologies to provide actionable insights, improve efficiency, and reduce costs.
